videoJson.name: Video Cassette Recording
videoJson.capacity:
VCR: 60 minutes
VCR-LP: 145 minutes
SVC: 240 minutes
videoJson.fact1: This was the first successful consumer-level home videocassette recorder system
videoJson.fact2: This format was marketed only in the U.K., Europe, Australia & South Africa
videoJson.fact3: This format introduced many features adopted by later videotape format decks such as its control buttons style, clock with timer, and a built-in tuner
